title: Data Analyst (Apprenticeship)
organization: LYSARC - The Lymphoma Academic Research Organisation
details: Continued development of interactive dashboards and performance indicators in Power BI to support data-driven decision-making for medical professionals and pharmaceutical stakeholders
Gained hands-on experience in data engineering tasks, including data pipeline development and database management using SQL and Python
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance data quality and implement best practices in data handling and analysis
Used text mining and natural language processing (NLP) techniques to extract insights from unstructured medical data, improving the comprehensiveness of analyses
note: This apprenticeship is part of my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at IUT Lyon 1, focusing on advanced data analysis and engineering skills.

title: Data Analyst (Internship)
organization: LYSARC - The Lymphoma Academic Research Organisation
details: Extracted, transformed and cleaned complex healthcare data using SAS and SQL, ensuring high data quality and consistency
Designed and developed interactive dashboards and performance indicators in Power BI to support data-driven decision-making for medical professionals and pharmaceutical stakeholders
Worked with a longitudinal database tracking over 5000 patients all over France
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to translate medical and scientific needs into actionnable insights and visual analytics
Ensured compliance with data privacy and healthcare regulations of sensitive patient information
note: This internship was part of my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at IUT Lyon 1, focusing on data analysis on sensitive data.

title: Sailing Instructor
organization: Multiple sailing clubs in Corsica and the south of France
details: Teaching catamaran and dinghy sailing courses at various levels
Participating in the training of new instructors
Multilingual skills: courses taught in French, English, and Spanish
Ensuring safety and enjoyment with up to 12 boats
Participating in the training of new instructors
